text: Mohamed Haniffa Mohamed (15 June 1921 â€“ 26 April 2016) was a Sri Lankan politician. Mohamed was the 14th Speaker of the Parliament of Sri Lanka (1989-1994) as well as being a former member of Parliament and government minister. Mohamed was the first Sri Lankan Moor to hold office as Mayor of Colombo from 1960 to 1962. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Speakers of the Parliament of Sri Lanka Category:Mayors
title: M. H. Mohamed
